languages.text: "Столько чистосердечных признаний в ереси всего в паре предложений. Как полагаете, сестра, на сколько смертных приговоров он уже наговорил?"
"So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"
languages.original_text: "Столько чистосердечных признаний в ереси всего в паре предложений. Как полагаете, сестра, на сколько смертных приговоров он уже наговорил?"

traits.locale_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in just a few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in just a few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “短短这么几句话，就公然说出了这么多异端言论。修女，你觉得就凭他这些话，应该判多少次死刑？”
languages.original_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: “短短这么几句话，就公然说出了这么多异端言论。修女，你觉得就凭他这些话，应该判多少次死刑？”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Tantas confesiones abiertas de herejía en tan pocas frases. Hermana, ¿cuántas sentencias de muerte considera que merecen esas palabras?».
languages.original_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: «Tantas confesiones abiertas de herejía en tan pocas frases. Hermana, ¿cuántas sentencias de muerte considera que merecen esas palabras?».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「ほんの少しの文章に、これほど多くの異端がバンと入ってる。シスター、奴の言葉にはどれほどの死刑判決が正当だと思うかい？」
languages.original_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: 「ほんの少しの文章に、これほど多くの異端がバンと入ってる。シスター、奴の言葉にはどれほどの死刑判決が正当だと思うかい？」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "So viel freimütig geäußerte Ketzerei in so wenigen Sätzen! Schwester, wie viele Todesurteile dürften seine Worte wohl wert sein?"
languages.original_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: "So viel freimütig geäußerte Ketzerei in so wenigen Sätzen! Schwester, wie viele Todesurteile dürften seine Worte wohl wert sein?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Tant d'aveux d'hérésie en si peu de phrases... Ma sœur, à combien de condamnations à mort estimez-vous ses déclarations ? »
languages.original_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: « Tant d'aveux d'hérésie en si peu de phrases... Ma sœur, à combien de condamnations à mort estimez-vous ses déclarations ? »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Şuncacık lafta bunca kâfirlik... Rahibe, sence sözlerine kaç kez idam cezası vermek icap eder?"
languages.original_text: "So many open admissions of heresy in so few sentences. Sister, how many death sentences would you say his words warrant?"

traits.locale_text: "Şuncacık lafta bunca kâfirlik... Rahibe, sence sözlerine kaç idam cezası vermek icap eder?"
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
